issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run test 1043 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
Width value is not calculated correctly

Expected Result:
Width value should be 40
fields.summary: Android: Left precedence is not calculating the correct width value when right contradicts center value

comments.body:
The width is calculated correctly as 40 units.
Verified on:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0.201206010843
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120602010244
Android Emulator 2.2
Android Runtime: v8
